ai-kv5.3:4.9_0: They shine in beauty and glory, and they are skillful.

ai-kv5.3:5.1_0: For someone who has attained the attainment of the earth-objects, a person who has attained a deep knowledge,
ai-kv5.3:5.3_0: The meditation on universal earth kasiṇa is entering:
ai-kv5.3:5.5_0: and if he were to say, “Let us attain an attainment of stream-entry,” he can live (also).
ai-kv5.3:5.6_0: “Who has attained the attainment of the earth kasiṇa, a person who has attained (true) knowledge?”
ai-kv5.3:6.1_0: For someone who has attained the attainment of the earth kasiṇa, the knowledge of the earth kasiṇa is the basis for eighteen meditations, and the attainment of the earth.
ai-kv5.3:6.3_0: even if a perfected one desiring a fully awakened Buddha
ai-kv5.3:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv5.3:7.1_0: even if a perfected one desiring a fully awakened Buddha
ai-kv5.3:7.3_0: there is a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, when the mind is diverse in perception, gives rise to view.
ai-kv5.3:7.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv5.3:8.1_0: There is no way of touching the mind for a perfected one, there is no wrong view.
ai-kv5.3:8.3_0: If he can’t be described with perceptions, he surely reflected about (them) in his mind,
ai-kv5.3:9.2_0: For someone who has attained the attainment of the earth-objects, a person who has attained a deep knowledge,
ai-kv5.3:9.4_0: The earth kasiṇa is attaining, and all-element in earth.
ai-kv5.3:9.5_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv5.3:9.6_0: Therefore the meditation on universal earth kasiṇa has attained a constituent attainment.
ai-kv5.3:10.1_0: For someone who has attained the attainment of the earth-objects, a person who has attained a deep knowledge,
ai-kv5.3:10.3_0: There is no earth, no one who enters and remains in earth.
ai-kv5.3:10.5_0: ‘There is earth, water, and fire in earth. But there is no one who enters it.
ai-kv5.3:10.6_0: “Who has attained the attainment of the earth kasiṇa, a person who has attained (true) knowledge?”
ai-kv5.3:11.1_0: There is the earth element, he becomes enter into a state of earth.
ai-kv5.3:11.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv5.3:11.6_0: “Who has attained the attainment of the earth kasiṇa, a person who has attained (true) knowledge?”
ai-kv5.3:11.7_0: The account of the discussion is finished.
